description: WIth a lightweight texture, 4-way stretch mobility to keep you moving, and moisture-wicking properties to keep you cool and confident, the Propsect Heights Crew packs a powerful punch in a simple, everyday workout style. Because it’s bluesign®-approved, you can feel good knowing that harmful chemicals were kept out of our waters and skies while this tank was made. Plus, it’s made with recycled polyester and REFIBRA™ upcycled fabric.
name: Prana Prospect Heights SS Top - Mens
